A guide of social management of new technology Joel Lööw Erik Sundström Jan Johansson Lisa Ringblom Lisa Öman Camilla Grane Lena Abrahamsson 2019-08-21 Preface This book is a product of SIMS (Sustainable Intelligent Mining Systems; http://simsmining.eu. So far it is a work in progress.1 It is a book that intends to give the reader some tools to help them in the social management of new technology. It is aimed chiefly at the mining industry; due to its unique characteristics, much traditional knowledge – or rather, knowledge regarding these issues from other industries – are not readily applicable. Therefore, this book seeks to adapt much of “uncontextualised” knowledge to the mining industry. To do so, we use the technologies of SIMS.
